item.description:
We had our busiest year ever in 2012. And the fun events continue. The best part is many of our members have posted ideas for events themselves. And a number of these ideas have become official events. We hope you will get a chance to participate soon.

This Meetup group is created for local Asian and Asian Americans (professionals & college students) to interact and network in a fun, relaxing environment. We gather to share a unique perspective that belongs to people of asian descent and to celebrate our diversity as well. Our members come from near and far (Boston to California to Asia).

Join us for a variety of activities that include restaurant outings, good conversation, indoor & outdoor activities, cultural events and day trips. Check out our calendar and photos to get an idea of what we are about. It's a great way to meet new people and have fun.

If you join our group - please:

1) include a current photo of yourself to help identify you at events. 

2) include your actual first name in your profile (last name is not required)

3) fill out profile info (do not leave it blank)

4) be considerate of your organizer(s) and other members by keeping your RSVPs up to date and attending events when you indicate that you will. A little courtesy and consideration go a long way, so please update your RSVP if your plans change. 

No show policy: No Show is cause for removal from our group. Two no-shows equal removal.

If you have any ideas for events, please contact one of the organizers or you can post your idea on our page as well. Many of our members have posted ideas that were turned into events.

We hope to see you soon.

Steve
Organizer
item.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group
